alert.note: Alert for Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 30 at 3:43PM MDT until June 30 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Southwestern portions of the Salt Lake Valley in northern Utah. * WHEN...Until 445 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas, ponding of water on roadways, and elevated small stream and creek flows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 341 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sandy, South Jordan, Draper, Riverton, Herriman, Bluffdale and Camp Williams.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
